department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: cross-legged seated Buddha with PL hand on lap, palm up; elongated earlobes with supports under each down to shoulders; pointed flame on top of head; traces of black, red, white and gold
dimension: 36 1/2 x 25 3/4 x 12 3/4 in. (92.71 x 65.41 x 32.39 cm) (approx., without attached base)
title: Seated Buddha in Maravijaya
